channel.title: How do i change the name of my server and also how do i change the port?
channel.description: i dont have client.java just regular client so please tell me what to do to change those things.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 01, 2006, 07:25:11 PM[/size][hr]also am giving admin spot to any1 that helps. also i need a coder and will b co-owner

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and also how do i change the port?
item.dc:creator: @da_crip da crip
item.description:
@da_crip wrote:

ok first be sure that when u click compile it doesnt say javac doesnt recognize…and to fix this go to tuts and look at flamed fury1’s tut and to change the port go in to the “server” file and search for your port (probaly 5555?) and change it to 43594 (this is the default which will make it so players dont have to put a port in)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of my server and also how do i change the port?

item.title: How do i change the name of my server and also how do i change the port?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

The Client.Java is the “Client”, And you change the name of your server by changing everything that says YOURSERVERNAME to a NEWSERVERNAME… And I think you can change your port # on Hamachi, if not, try Port Forwarding.

Read full topic
